Text.Page:
All Cultists are annoying, but the worst is the {@LinkCreature:25#1051#skeletal pikemen}. They keep coming after us, even after losing all their limbs. I guess the dead don't feel pain, but looking at their limbless bodies squirming is just...creepy. The Atel Akaad stuck frenzied cores in them. It's what's keeping them moving.

Go collect the cores, then bring them to Orlaith at Scholar's Refuge.
Thank you! I hope we can take this opportunity and wipe them all out. I'm not really sure how we'll manage, mind, few as we are.
If we're going to eliminate these skeletal pikemen, I need you to collect more frenzied cores.
